word_mean: 注射：将一种液体注入皮下组织、血管或器官。参见infusion项下
注射液：在药剂学上，指正式规定适合注射用的溶液。见specitic substance项下
从药材中提取的有效物质制成的可供注入人体内灭菌溶液或乳状液，以及供临用前配成溶液的无菌粉末或浓溶液制剂。

sentence.Network_en: Execution by lethal injection is scheduled for July 30th.
sentence.Network_cn: 定于7月30日执行注射死刑。

sentence.Network_en: It has to be given by injection, usually twice daily.
sentence.Network_cn: 它必须通过注射摄入，通常一天两次。

sentence.Network_en: He was executed by lethal injection earlier today.
sentence.Network_cn: 他于今天早些时候被注射处死。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin injectio(n-), from the verb inicere (see inject)

entry.def: If you have an injection, a doctor or nurse puts a medicine into your body using a device with a needle called a syringe.

example.ex: They gave me an injection to help me sleep...
example.tran: 他们给我打了一针帮助我入睡。

example.ex: It has to be given by injection, usually twice daily.
example.tran: 它必须通过注射摄入,通常一天两次。

entry.def: An injection of money or resources into an organization is the act of providing it with more money or resources, to help it become more efficient or profitable.

example.ex: An injection of cash is needed to fund some of these projects...
example.tran: 需要现金投入来资助这其中的一些项目。

example.ex: The company is hoping to obtain a £50 million cash injection from the government.
example.tran: 公司希望从政府那里得到5,000万英镑的现金投入。

means.word_mean: 1. the forceful insertion of a substance under pressure
2. any solution that is injected (as into the skin)
3. the act of putting a liquid into the body by means of a syringe;

sentences.sentence: "the nurse gave him a flu shot"

auth_sentence.content: Some are taken by mouth, some by injection.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some are taken by mouth, some by injection.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some are taken by mouth, some by injection.

auth_sentence.res_content: Even title-winning players need an injection of fresh impetus.

auth_sentence.content: Mice without the injection died after the radiation treatments.

sentences.en: Those drugs are given by injection as well as through the mouth.
sentences.cn: 那些药品可以注射, 也可以口服。

jushi.english: The nurse gave the patient an injection of penicillin.
jushi.chinese: 护士给患者打了一针青霉素。

jushi.english: Those drugs are given by injection as well as through the mouth.
jushi.chinese: 那些药品可以注射,也可以口服。

jushi.english: You will need an injection every four hours.
jushi.chinese: 你需要每四小时打一针。
